answers.answer: Cheese, raw veggies, cold cuts, nuts, small amount of fruit (experiment to find which ones don't jack up her blood sugar, start with apples and berries), peanut butter.

question: Hi all. My stepdaughter was diagnosed with type1 diabetes last week. This is our first weekend to have her to after leaving the hospital. Can anyone give me some good snack ideas that will go to 20 grams? She is a sweet eater and and very picky, now have to steer away from the yummy sugars she enjoys. any suggestions? Thanks
title: Recently diagnosed
